entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
